segments.advisor_message: So, when we talk about your home, I just want to clarify whether it's owned or rented. This affects how we approach your financial planning.
segments.client_message: Oh, I see. It's owned, but could you explain what you mean by 'financial planning'?

segments.advisor_message: Absolutely! Financial planning involves setting goals, analyzing your current financial situation, and developing a plan together. We take into account things like your assets and any debts you might have.
segments.client_message: Got it! So, should I also mention my address? I live in Canterbury, at 123 Main Street, postcode CT1 1AA.
